allow:
Bash(git -C /mnt/bunker/projects/snip commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update currency from dollars to euros throughout frontend

- Updated invoice form to display prices in euros
- Updated payment modal to display amounts in euros
- Updated invoices page to show totals in euros
- Updated client detail page invoice display to euros
- Updated appointment form service prices to euros

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /mnt/bunker/projects/snip commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add missing POST route for creating clients

- Add create function to clients controller
- Add POST / route to clients routes
- Creates user with CLIENT role, then creates client profile

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /mnt/bunker/projects/snip commit -m "Make passwordHash optional on User model

Allow clients to be created without password hash since they may not need to log in to the system.")
Bash(git -C /mnt/bunker/projects/snip commit -m "Create migration for optional passwordHash")

Bash(git -C /mnt/bunker/projects/snip commit -m "Revert passwordHash to required, add password to client creation

- Make passwordHash required in User schema
- Add password field to client creation endpoint
- Remove migration that made passwordHash optional
- Password must be provided when creating a client")

Bash(git -C /mnt/bunker/projects/snip commit -m "Add password field to client creation form

- Add password field \(required for new clients, not shown for edits\)
- Validate password minimum 6 characters
- Only send password when creating new clients")
